articles.title: Apple sidelines AI news summaries due to errors
articles.author: Frederic J. BROWN
articles.summary: Apple pushed out a software update on Thursday which disabled news headlines and summaries generated using artificial intelligence that were lambasted for getting facts wrong. The update comes as Apple enhances its latest lineup of devices with "Apple Intelligence" in a market keen for assurance that the iPhone maker is a contender in the AI race.
